data.text: “As for you, take up a lament for the princes of Israel
She brought up one of her cubs,
When the nations heard of him,
When she saw that she had waited in vain,
He broke down their strongholds 19:7 Or He knew their widows or He seized their widows
Then the nations set out against him
Your mother was like a vine in your vineyard,19:10 Some Hebrew manuscripts; most Hebrew manuscripts in your bloodline
It had strong branches, fit for a ruler’s scepter.
But it was uprooted in fury,
Now it is planted in the wilderness,
Fire has gone out from its main branch
